attributes.action: Theresa May should resign as she does not represent the wishes of the UK.
attributes.background: She has no interest in the petition to stop Trump visiting the UK. She said,"It will be a matter for Parliament now whether it is debated [but] what we've been very clear on is that we have extended this invitation to the President and it has been accepted and we will proceed with a state visit."

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178727
